titleStmt.title: The petition of the county of Essex to the Honourable House of Commons, subscribed with above twenty thousand hands, and attended to London with above two thousand horsemen. Presented to the house the 18 Jan. 1641. by Sir Richard Everard, Sir John Barrington, Sir William Martin, Mr. William Massum, Esqrs. and 16 other of the chiefe knights and gentlemen in the shire. Also the humble petition of the county of Sommeset [sic].

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coules & T. Bancks,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
